page.title: 10SHEEP FARMING
page.content: I look after 700 ewes on a mixed farm.They are divided into 5 flocks and moved from field to field. I have four working collies whose help is invaluable especially when moving the flocks and bringing them down to the farm for routine jobs such as shearing dipping and foot trimming.The sheep are also brought down for lambing and the early lambing at Christmas is done inside, which gives the lambs a much better chance. The fat lambs are folded on roots for a short time in winter, the rest are fed hay and grain and kept on grass. The work needs total commitment,particulary at lambing time,but I personally would prefer no other.
